channel.title: Rashmi Metaliks - World's 2nd Largest DI Pipe Manufacturer
channel.description: Latest updates and news from Rashmi Metaliks - World's 2nd largest DI pipe manufacturer with 770,000 MT annual capacity. Leading producer of high-quality steel products including DI Pipes, TMT Bars, Pig Iron, and more.

item.title: Rashmi Metaliks Achieves Position as World's 2nd Largest DI Pipe Manufacturer
item.description: Rashmi Metaliks proudly announces its achievement as the world's 2nd largest DI pipe manufacturer with an impressive 770,000 MT annual production capacity.

item.title: New Product Line: Enhanced Fe 550 EQCR TMT Bars
item.description: We're proud to announce our new Fe 550 EQCR grade TMT Bars with superior strength and durability for critical infrastructure projects.

item.title: Rashmi Metaliks Recognized for Excellence in Manufacturing
item.description: Rashmi Metaliks has been recognized by the Industry Standards Association for excellence in steel product manufacturing and quality assurance.

item.title: Expanded Production Capacity for Ductile Iron Pipes
item.description: We've expanded our production capacity for Ductile Iron Pipes to meet the growing demand in water infrastructure projects across the country.
